import React from 'react'; import"./Ads.css" function Ads() { return

Le Muse cuisine

Taste the art of our cuisine

Le Muse cuisine is an alchemy of carefully selected fresh ingredients. We want to nourish every sense of the guests. Sitting at the table means enjoying the exquisite taste of our creations but also admiring their plating and savoring the aromas that come from dishes. Food is an immense emotion and we cook to excite

; } export default Ads;
